name: Grand Theft ATP
description:
Steal ATP from the cells of a human been by using bacteria, you must defend against the white cells Macrophages and T-Cells, lucky you will get help of viruses that will weaken them.

Grand Theft ATP (GTA) it's a strategy turn base game with 4 levels to complete, setup in an educational theme it tries to introduce you in Immune Systems and Cellular Biology.
